孷字的基本解释

孷
lí
〔孷孖（
z?）〕a.人和哺乳动物产双子。b.双生子。

孷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》里之切，平之，來。］
见“孷孖”。

孷字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【子字部】　孷； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页280第22
【廣韻】里之切【集韻】【類篇】陵之切，?音釐。【玉篇】孷孖，雙生也。【揚子·方言】?楚閒凡人嘼乳而雙產曰孷孳。　又【集韻】良志切，音吏。義同。◎按《方言》雙生子本作釐孿。釐，離也，孿而分生也，俗作孷。《正字通》曰：雙生有孿㝈二文，女部嫠爲寡婦，孷蓋獨子也，與孤音殊義通，說亦是。

考證：〔【揚子·方言】陳楚閒凡人嘼乳而雙產曰孷孖。〕　謹照方言原文及集韻所引方言，孖改孳。
孷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
孷字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
孷
lí
〔孷孖（
z?)] a. Humans and mammals give birth to twins. b. Twins.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Yin Ji 1】【Sub Word Department】　孷; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 280-22
[Guangyun] Li Zhiqi [Jiyun] [Class Chapter] Ling Zhiqi,? Yin Li. [Jade articles] twins and twins. [Yangtze Dialect]? Chuxian mortal suffocated milk and had double birth.　[Jiyun] Liangzhi cut, voice officer. The same meaning. ◎According to the "Dialect" twins are made as twins. Li, li also, twins and split births, vulgar is 孷. "Zhengzitong" says: There are two texts for twins, the female part is a widow, and the only child is the only child. It has a special meaning with the solitary sound, which is also true. Textual research: [[Yangtze Dialect] Chen Chuxian mortal sips milk and gives birth to a twin. 〕　I would like to change the dialect according to the original dialect and the dialect cited in Jiyun.
